Added the dashboard project to both resume data files (English and French). It will appear in the portfolio with the tag **"Next.js NestJS"** as a separate filter category.

The dashboard project includes:
- **Tag**: "Next.js NestJS" (appears as its own filter tab)
- **Title**: "Dashboard"
- **Description**: Brief description mentioning Next.js frontend and NestJS backend
- **Links**: Placeholder GitHub and website links (you can update these)

The project will appear in the portfolio when you select the "Next.js NestJS" tab or "All". You can update:
- The image URL (currently using a placeholder)
- The description with more specific details
- The GitHub and website links

The dashboard is now integrated and ready to display in your portfolio.
